title: rito jems
body: hello rito!! i woke up today and i wanted to join to my acc..so i open the game but when i put my username and my password i waited 20 minutes for you to verify my stats...the result was that i still cant join to my acc and play a game can you do sth about it?

replies.body: After looking over your account it doesn't seem like there are any signs that someone might have hacked your account, so we're good on that front. It sounds like your network might be having a hard time getting connected with our servers, so try running through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that's able to help.
